version.updateDescription: A new version ({{latest}}) is available. You are using version {{current}}.

configurationPage.For standard models select from the LLM: For standard models: select from the LLM dropdown.
For Ollama: set API key to 'ollama'.

configurationPage.Click \"Start Research in Terminal\" to: Click "Start Research in Terminal" to launch a new terminal.
